Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka hope to end World Cup duck against Pakistan

Both sides have played one game in this World Cup, have shaken hands and introduced themselves to this World Cup. Neither has quite made the best first impression, but Pakistan have two points and a win pinned to their lapel, while Sri Lanka remain unadorned at the points table.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch in Hyderabad has been batting-friendly so far in the World Cup. The team batting first has scored more than 300 runs in both matches at the Rajiv Gandhi International Cricket Stadium.
The skies will be partly cloudy during the Pakistan vs Sri Lanka match in Hyderabad. The chances of rainfall during the match are close to 0%.
